title: L'en-Cas Bio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic cafe in the city centre near Annecy Vieille Ville (old town). Offers salads, sandwiches, tarts, quiche, fresh juices. Has sorbet that's vegan suitable, and you could ask for soymilk in hot chocolate. For lunch, there is a vegan option with the assiette végétalienne which consists of seitan steak, hummus, and salad. Let your server know if you want vegan.
